revised_title: Further Research on Light Dispersion and Its Theoretical Applications
tldr: The author continues their research on the dispersion of light, comparing the theoretical refractive index from M. Cauchy's system of undulations to observed values in various media. They also discuss new findings from M. Rudberg, including refractive indices for standard rays in calcareous spar and quartz, as well as the action of light on plants and the atmosphere.
